website_summaries.verdict: Durable, heavyweight steel cooks evenly for smaller paella dishes.
pros: Made with heavy duty aluminized steel
Rust proof with the proper care
cons: Nonstick surface is very sensitive and rusts quickly without proper care

customer_reviews.title: warps on medium heat
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to like this pan. Tried it on my glass cooktop. On medium heat the middle of the pan warped so bad that the pancake i had would only cook on one tiny spot. Its a shame to. The handles and nonstick seem decent.
customer_reviews.author: bal495

customer_reviews.title: Perfect paella!
customer_reviews.text: This pan made perfect paella. While it is larger than the burner on the stove, I was able to use 2 burners and keep me bing it around. The paella turned out great!
customer_reviews.author: math teacher

customer_reviews.title: The prices and it’s very good quality .. I love it
customer_reviews.text: Very happy to have bought it very good material, I arrive on time and I can cook my Pancakes I can also cook my meats as I like and the price is perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Norma

customer_reviews.title: Great Paella Pan
customer_reviews.text: Great versatile pan, good size for making plenty of paella! Like that the pan is made in the USA.
customer_reviews.author: lvb

customer_reviews.title: Mmm...paella!
customer_reviews.text: Great paella pan. Big and flat. Just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.author: Beaches and Reads

customer_reviews.title: I searched for a pan that would work on my ...
customer_reviews.text: I searched for a pan that would work on my ceramic stove top. The pan warped even though I followed instructions and used medium heat. I will keep it and use in outdoor cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great pan! I have not made paella with it ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pan! I have not made paella with it yet but I have used it for similar stove to oven recipes with great success. Even my father who is an old school/old country chef commented on its quality - and that's coming from a man says everything good is just ok.
customer_reviews.author: amonymous

customer_reviews.title: buying one for myself
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my super foodie in_laws. She made paella and it turned out wonderful. Right size for 4_5 people. My husband often makes paella and uses a large frying pan. I am ordering another pan for our house. I did originally order a different pan on Amazon and it was too light and I sent it back. I have had good luck with Nordic ware brand, this pan was a good buy. Heavy enough to heat evenly.
customer_reviews.author: Hello Kitty

customer_reviews.title: ... pan I have ever owned but i was very happy with its performance after making my first dish with ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the first paella pan I have ever owned but i was very happy with its performance after making my first dish with it. It is big and takes up a big chunk of my stove top real estate. However, it is sized appropriately to cook evenly just using the center burner. I really liked the high sides on this pan which allowed me to cook a Paella dish that fed 8 people. It is easy to clean with its non-stick surface and the price point made it a no brainer to add to my collection of pans.
customer_reviews.author: amsoma2004

customer_reviews.title: Non stick chipping after one use!
customer_reviews.text: Cooked in this once and hand washed after. The non stick coating has already started coming off making this unsafe to cook with again. Highly disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Jjj333

customer_reviews.title: Large paella pan
customer_reviews.text: nice paella pan. This is good for a large group. I am going to try to make pizza in it.
customer_reviews.author: W @ Long Beach

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Love it. It's too big for my largest burner, but they do advise turning the pan if that is the case.
customer_reviews.author: Caryl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I already replied on the pan,by mistake on request for lid.
customer_reviews.author: HOT MAMA

customer_reviews.title: This would have rated 5 stars except for the fact ...
customer_reviews.text: This would have rated 5 stars except for the fact that when the pandas get hot it starts to bow on go glass-top ranges.
customer_reviews.author: J Lovelace

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Never had a mark or a scratch on this pan and it gets daily use!
customer_reviews.author: Judith Mariani

product_meta.title: Nordic Ware Paella Pan, 15-Inch, Tan
product_meta.description: Nordic ware international specialties feature a variety of unique ethnic products influenced by countries around the globe. Each carry a 10-year warranty. This pan is designed for Spain's famous and delicious paella recipes. Premium heavyweight aluminized steel pan distributes heat evenly all the way to its edges. Ideal for general purpose high-sided griddle or a crepe/pancake pan too.
feature_bullets: Idea for general purpose high-sided griddle
Made in the USA with handles from Taiwan

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars28 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
